title: What type of interaction is this?
Appointment prep
html:
Check PP for Consultation Form

Find the person in PP

Click Memos/Files

Scroll to Memos section

Find â€œConsultation Formâ€

Review information

Check PP for Do Not Adopt (DNA)

If there is an alert for DNA, one should pop-up when you open the Person record.

Also check memos for a DNA note.

title: Walk in prep
Any concerning behavior?
html: Watch how the adopter interacts with the cat. Encourage questions. Ask questions about the home, children, other pets (both past and present), doggie doors etc. Ask about philosophies like indoor vs outdoor cats, declawing etc. If anything feels off, pause and talk to staff.

title: Did they choose a cat today?
html:
If they clearly chose a specific cat today, pick Yes and move into the adoption steps.

If they are still thinking, or no cat is going home today, pick No.

title: Does the adopter already have a Person record?
html:
From the main search, type their name and confirm if there is already a record for this person.

If the Person does NOT exist in PP create the Person record:

Use the green plus icon to create a new Person.

Fill in name, address, phone, and email so you can contact them later.

title: Is contact info verified?
html:
Verify the Address, Phone Number and Email address.

Edit the contact

Click the green pencicl icon under the personâ€™s name next to â€œDetailsâ€

title: Has Outcome to Adoption been started?
html:
Start an Adoption Outcome on the Person

Open the Person record for the adopter.

Use the green plus menu to add a new Outcome.

Adoption Outcome fields
FieldValue
Type:Adoption
SubtypeKittyville
DateTodayâ€™s date
StatusCompleted
Asilomar StatusHealthy (Unless stated otherwise on cat)
JurisdictionChange to Personâ€™s jurisdiction
PersonVerify this matches
AnimalsSearch and add the kitty (s)
Multiple Cats ğŸˆğŸˆ adopted?

For multiple cats, you need to repeat the search and add step for the second kitty.

Tip: Click on the blue ID number for each cat, which will open the catâ€™s record in a new tab for upcoming steps. --- End Accordions ---

title: Have vouchers been created?
html:
Each cat should have the correct voucher created.

Create a voucher:

Go to the Cat record

Click Vouchers/Waivers tab

Click green + icon

Fill the Voucher form:

After saving vouchers on each cat, return to Person tab. Click Save on the Outcome form.

FieldValue
TypeCare
SubtypeEDAH 30-day Exam Voucher
IssuedTodayâ€™s date
Expiry[ automatically calculated]
Issued byFearless Kitty, Rescue

title: Is microchip consent completed?
html: NOTE: Checkboxes below are a visual aid only. â˜ Inform adopter of the microchip

title: Have folder contents been reviewed?
html:
Review contents of red folder:
SheetDescription
Adoption Disclosure(s):Review Kitten and/or any Medical ADA's with adopter and have them sign and date. If not a kitten, pull ADA and refile it. Ask adopter if they want a copy of ADA(s).
Spay/Neuter dateIf more than 2 weeks since surgery, pull the spay/neuter info and return to hanging file.
Vaccination statusIf 2nd vaccine due in future, give adopter the FKR Medical business card; ask them to send email to address on card to request appointment date noted on form.
Advice DocumentPoint out any pertinent areas based on situation o Introducing new kitty to other cats, dogs, children, o List of items to purchase if not already owned.
Boutique Discount$5 off a minimum $10 total- valid for 30 days
Petco document20% off ENTIRE purchase. Note Expiration Date
Continuing Care:This is for any other non-FKR kitties that the adopter has. Pull from folder if adopter has no non-FKR kitties.

title: Has the contract been signed and emailed?
html:
Have the adopter read the laminated contract. Find out if there are any questions before proceeding.

Create a Contract

Go to the Person page.

On the Records tab, scroll to the Outcome record created today. (Previous FKR adopters may have a previous outcomes)

On the right side, click the green Printer icon

Select Contract OR if ğŸˆğŸˆ select Multi-Animal Contract

Signing the Contract

Verify correct animal(s) listed on Contract page

Scroll to the bottom of the page and click the green eSignature box.

Have adopter sign via the signature pad. Click Next.

Adoption counselor (you!) sign for the Organization. Click Finish.

Scroll down on the new page displaying the contract. CIick "Email" button.

Ensure confirmation "E-mail Sent" is there before closing the page.

Review email contents to expect:

Medical History Report

Your Adoption Contract

24 PetWatch Microchip Registration Information

Voucher

title: Has payment been processed?
html:
Payment should be collected and recorded correctly:

Payment slip instructions
FieldValue
Date, Kitty Name and Adopter NameAs appropriate
Adoption FeeEnter amount of adoption fee and note any variants to fee (Waived / reduced / name your fee event)
Boutique PurchaseItemize items purchased on back of slip, mark discounts if applicable. List total on front of slip. OR: Have adopter take all boutique purchases to front desk.
DonationsAs appropriate
PaymentX line for payment type if cash or check Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  Cash or check: staple to back of payment slip Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  Debit/Credit card: type of card & last 4 numbers of card as detected in Square confirmation. (Note Apple pay numbers may not match physical card #, so use the number recorded by Square).
iPad Square application - Use for debit/credit card purchases:

Enter total collected

Use Â·c" on lower left part of screen if need to correct amount.

Tap on "Review Transaction" on bottom of screen and show adopter amount to be charged.

Tap on â€œProcess Transaction"

Ask if adopter wants receipt and after you select the correct method, have adopter enter own information.

title: Final checks before leaving
html: Age appropriate adoption bag given with:

title: Has adopter memo been completed?
html:
Add an Adoption Outcome memo on the person record:

On the Person record, go to Memos/Files Tab

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  Click the green + next to Memos.

FieldValue
TypeAdoption Outcome
SubtypeAdopted
Review dateLeave blank
CommentsThis should include key facts about the adopter and appointment and items you discussed you feel would be helpful if adopter calls with questions. â€¢ None of this information is being published and will remain private in PetPoint.

title: Has cat outcome memo been completed?
html:
Repeat for ğŸˆğŸˆ.

Add a short outcome memo on Each Cat record.

Click Memos/Files.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  Click the green + sign next to Memos.

TypeOutcome
SubtypeAdopt
Review dateLeave blank
CommentsYou can add a simple sentence saying kitty was adopted and if they will join other pets in their new home. No other personal information about adopter.

title: Has association been updated?
html:
On the Person page, go to Associations tab

If "Adopter" is already listed (previously adopted an FKR kitty), click â€œcontinueâ€ below to proceed to next step

Create an Association for Adopter

Note the Subtype on the â€œPotential Adopterâ€ row.

Click the green +

FieldValue
TypeAdopter
SubtypeÂ·Â Â Â Â Â Â  Should match the one from â€œPotential Adopterâ€ Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  If adopter was a walk in, select the same subtype as noted on page 2 of the Consultation Form

title: Have ADA forms been uploaded?
html:
Scan Document:

Place Adoption Disclosure Document (Kitten or Medical) in scanner and push button

Save to Downloads folder with filename in format: "Adoption Disclosure Agreement - kitty nameâ€

If applicable (Medical ADA only): Medical ADA - kitty name

Upload Document:

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  On the Cat record, go to Memos/Files

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  Click on green + sign next to Files

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  Click Upload

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  Tear up and throw away the signed ADA

FieldValue
Name"Signed Kitten ADA - kitty name" and/or "Signed Medical ADA - kitty name"
TypeAdoption Document
SubtypeAdoption Disclosure Agreement - ADA
ExpirationLeave blank
Select FilesBrowse to Downloads folder and select files.

title: Has consultation form been uploaded?
html:
Scan Document:

Place Consultation Form in scanner and push button

Save to Downloads folder with filename in format: "Consultation Form -Adopter's Nameâ€

Upload Document:

On the Person record, go to Memos/Files

Click on green + sign next to Files

Click Upload

Tear up and throw away the Consultation Form

FieldValue
NameConsultation Form
TypeAdoption Document
SubtypeAdoption Consultation
ExpirationLeave blank
Select FilesBrowse to Downloads folder and select files.

title: Has receipt been entered in PetPoint?
html:
This is the Receipt in PP, not the payment slip completed earlier, but you will need to reference that.

Create a Receipt in PP:

On the Person page, in top right corner, click green +

Choose Receipt

If any discounts, click the button below for steps before continuing.

Click Pay button

In the next pop-up, for Type â€“ ALWAYS choose â€œCashâ€

Click Save

Cash DrawerChoose how the adopter pays
ReferenceIf card used, add card type (Visa, MC, Discover, etc) and last 4 numbers of card from the Payment Slip.
AnimalsÂ·Â Â Â Â Â Â  Enter the name of kitty adopted to search and add. Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  ğŸˆğŸˆÂ  Repeat for multiple kitties
PersonMake sure adopter is listed
ItemsÂ·Â Â Â Â Â Â  Choose the item based on Kittyâ€™s age. Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  For single kitty, it will default kitty info. Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  For ğŸˆğŸˆ : oÂ Â  Details will pop-up, select the Kitty from the list. oÂ Â  Add another item based on second kittyâ€™s age oÂ Â  Details will pop-up, select second kitty from list.
Adjusting with Discounts:

If discounting the fee of the cat(s), do the following steps :

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  Click on the Green Pencil icon on the right line of the cat with the discounted fee.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  Add the discount - either % or $ amount

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  Review that the subtotal is correct

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  Select the appropriate Discount Reason

oÂ Â  Â When using the Â·other" reason, add information regarding the situation and who approved the discount.

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  Click Save

title: Has calendar been updated?
html:
Update the appointment with correct notes or outcome:

Click the Calendar icon to open the Visual Calendar window.

Double-click on the adoption appointment you are working on. An Appointment Overview box will pop up.

Scroll down and click the blue "Edit Appointment" Box.

Page will open behind the "Adoption Overview" screen. Be sure to go to that screen.

Click Submit Appointment

SubtypeLeave the selected "Meet and Greetâ€ there.
StatusSelect "Completed".
Status ReasonSelect "Adopted" or "Did Not Adopt" as appropriate.
Start Date/TimeEnter the date and time the appointment was scheduled to start.
End Date/TimeEnter the date and time the appointment was scheduled to end (one hour after the start). If the appointment ended early and you are updating the calendar before the scheduled end time, you may enter the current time.
Assigned ToSelect your name under the drop-down menu or "Fearless Kitty Rescue" if your name is not listed.
Calendar colorLeave it to whatever is selected (usually pink).

title: Has photo been texted to Kim?
html:
Send the approved adoption photo for social media or records.

Photo should be vertical orientation & taken wide angle (from urther away) to allow room for cropping as needed

title: Has Outlook follow-up email been sent?
html:
Send the Outlook adoption email :

Open Outlook

Click on "Create New Message"

BCC: Adoption Notification (the To and CC are left blank)

Subject: Name(s) of cats adopted

Message: Name(s) of cats adopted, PP done, and then indicate if photo was sent. Also include the name(s) of adoption counselors working that day at the end of message.

title: Have payment slips been filed?
html:
Place completed payment slip with card or check in Barbs folder

Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â  If adopter paid with cash, place payment slip/cash in black lock box.

title: Have whiteboards been updated?
html:
Room White Board: Remove kitty's name or the photo in frame.

Large White Board by Medical: Remove kitty's name

Adoption Board: Write next number, kitty's name, circled A, and date.

If FTA- add in lower right section of Adoption Board.

title: Wrap up â€“ no adoption
html:
If no cat was adopted, make sure the notes and future follow up are clear.

Add Future adopt - needs discussion memo if needed on the Person page

Upload consultation form to Person record

Update calendar with correct reason

title: Checklist complete
html:
You are done with this case. Tap below to start over.
